generated_body: If you choose to read the article titled "2019 is the year of the 'climate strike'," you may find an exploration of the significant global movements advocating for climate action that emerged in 2019. The article likely discusses various protests and strikes organized by activists, particularly youth-led initiatives, aimed at raising awareness about climate change. It could detail the responses from governments and corporations to these movements, as well as the underlying issues motivating the strikes. Additionally, there may be insights into the potential long-term impacts of these actions on environmental policy and public opinion regarding climate change.
